text: Flight to Japan is an album led by the pianist Duke Jordan, recorded in 1976 in Tokyo and released on the Danish SteepleChase label in 1978.Duke Jordan discography, accessed March 24, 2015 \- SteepleChase Records discography, accessed March 24, 2015 ==Reception== AllMusic awarded the album 3 stars.Allmusic listing, accessed March 24, 2015 ==Track listing== All compositions by Duke Jordan except as indicated # "Lullaby of the Orient" - 6:12 # "Bridgetown" - 3:50 # "The Bullet" - 3:41 # "Love Hotel" - 5:27 # "Stone Wall Blues" - 5:14 # "I Can't Get Started" (Vernon Duke, Ira Gershwin) - 9:29 # "Flight to Japan" - 4:47 # "Table Chess" - 3:56 Bonus track on CD release ==Personnel== *Duke Jordan - piano *Wilbur Little - double bass *Roy Haynes - drums ==References== Category:1978 albums Category:Duke Jordan albums Category:SteepleChase Records albums
title: Flight to Japan
